description: Travel service providers like airlines and travel service distributors like OTAs use CAM to pay for on-chain transactions.
Validators (travel-related companies) get CAM token rewards for validating transactions.
Travelers can access exclusive offers for holding and paying in CAM tokens.
Web3 and travel tech can apply for a grant in CAM tokens to provide infrastructure, or dApps needed in the network.
Travel dApps can use CAM to pay for bookings.
Travelers can get rewards in CAM for using Camino Network dApps.
KYB-verified consortium member can submit proposals and vote.
